qas.question: How many factories had strikes on October 26?
What were the strikes in protest against?

context: On October 24, the union Supreme Soviet passed a law eliminating special seats for Communist Party and other official organizations' representatives. On October 26, <a0_0>twenty<a0_0/> factories in <a1_0>Lviv<a1_0/> held strikes and meetings to protest the <a2_0>police brutality<a2_0/> of October 1 and the authorities' unwillingness to prosecute those responsible. From October 26–28, the Zelenyi Svit (Friends of the Earth – Ukraine) environmental association held its founding congress, and on October 27 the Ukrainian Supreme Soviet passed a law eliminating the special status of party and other official organizations.
